attributes.name: title
attributes.description: The text printed on the accordion button row. This attribute will never update.

slots.description: This is the slot for the content inside of the accordion.
This is the slot for the content inside of the card.

tags.name: fukuro-dropdown
tags.description: A searchable dropdown component. Works similar to a <select> with <option> elements that populate it.

slots.description: This is a slot for the HTMLOptionElement children.

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: The header text of the element.

attributes.name: subtitle
attributes.description: The subtitle text of the element.

slots.name: header
slots.description: This is a slot for the header content.

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: This is a slot for the subtitle content.

tags.name: fukuro-list-group
tags.description: A showcase of how to use the data-for (or sometimes data-name) pattern for component composition.

slots.description: The default slot is used for buttons and paragraphs where the data-for attribute on the paragraph elements should match the name attribute on the buttons.

tags.name: fukuro-list-group-nested
tags.description: A showcase of how to use an event pattern for component composition.

slots.description: The default slot is used for fukuro-list-group-item elements.

tags.name: fukuro-list-group-item
tags.description: A showcase of how to use an event pattern for component composition.

events.name: list_group_item_clicked
events.description: This event is fired when the element is clicked.

tags.name: fukuro-cookie-banner
tags.description: A banner at the bottom of the screen with an accept and reject button! Ask whatever question you want and capture the event on accept/reject.

events.name: accept
events.description: This event is fired when the accept button is clicked.

events.name: reject
events.description: This event is fired when the reject button is clicked.

tags.name: fukuro-tooltip-ts
tags.description: A tooltip that can target any CSS selector in its document.

attributes.name: text
attributes.default: "You forgot to set a tooltip text!"

properties.name: tooltipText
properties.default: "You forgot to set a tooltip text!"

tags.name: fukuro-lit-lifecycle
tags.description: This component shows off the lit lifecycle.

attributes.name: number
attributes.description: The prop representing the number attribute internally.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The prop representing the number attribute internally.

tags.name: fukuro-button
tags.description: An extended native button with custom styles.

tags.name: fukuro-ul
tags.description:
An extended native ul with custom functionality for nested uls.
Any uls placed inside the custom ul will be imploded by default, and explode on click.

attributes.name: text
attributes.default: "You forgot to set a tooltip text!"

properties.name: tooltipText
properties.default: "You forgot to set a tooltip text!"
